visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts map chart that visualizes the population of the world's major areas (Europe, Oceania, Africa, Asia, North America, and South America) using custom colors for each area. The chart should have a title and subtitle, with the subtitle linking to a source document. The chart should also include map navigation buttons at the bottom and data labels for each area. The chart should be styled with specific colors for each area and should be centered on the page with a fixed height and width.

title.text: POPULATION OF THE WORLD AND ITS MAJOR AREAS, 1750-2150

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts map chart configuration is designed to visualize the population of the world's major areas using a custom map of world continents. The chart includes a title and subtitle, with the subtitle linking to a source document for reference. The map navigation buttons are enabled and positioned at the bottom of the chart for user interaction. The legend is disabled, and each continent is color-coded according to the specified data classes in the colorAxis configuration. The data series includes the name of each continent and its corresponding data, with data labels enabled to display the name of each continent on the map. The chart is styled with specific colors for each continent, ensuring clear differentiation between them. The overall layout is centered on the page with a fixed height and width, ensuring a consistent and visually appealing presentation.
